# Jekyll-Tutorial: Plugins

[Jekyll has a plugin system](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/plugins/) with hooks that allows the creation of custom generated code.

Designing and developing a plugin that adds in the [blind effect](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/jquery-ui-blind-effect/) for a [tag block](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/plugins/tags/).

### Folders



### Files

 - taken from [Introduction to plugins](https://learn.cloudcannon.com/jekyll/using-jekyll-plugins/)

 - taken from [Tags](https://jekyllrb.com/docs/plugins/tags/)
